title: The Joint Pizzeria and Deli
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Pizza, Italian, Fast food, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Build your own pizza using 25+ veggie toppings including vegan basil pesto, vegan sun-dried tomato pesto, soy-mozza (includes casein), Yves brand meats, and their own brand of vegan cheese, plus a wide array of vegetables. Crust options include organic whole wheat, and gluten-free rice crust. Menu clearly indicates vegetarian and vegan options.
